Package controller

Class CustomersController

java.lang.Object
controller.CustomersController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class CustomersController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller for adding, editing and deleting customers, as well as navigating to other screens.

  • Method Details

    • infoIsValid

      public boolean infoIsValid()
      Validates that all inputs have data before adding to database.

    • hasNoAppts

      public boolean hasNoAppts(Customer custy)
      Method to verify that the selected customer has no appointments. You are unable to delete a customer if they have scheduled appointments.
      Parameters:
      custy - the customer that needs to be checked
      Returns:
      boolean returns true if customer is safe to delete.

    • onAddCust

      public void onAddCust(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException
      Adds customer to the database. Runs input validation checks before adding to database
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - triggered by clicking the add button
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • onEditCust

      public void onEditCust(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException
      Edits the selected customer. Runs validation checks then updates the database.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - triggered by clicking the update button.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • onDelCust

      public void onDelCust(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException
      Deletes the selected customer. Asks for confirmation then removes from the database.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - triggered by clicking the delete button.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • onClearForm

      public void onClearForm(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Clears all text in the text fields and comboboxes. Leaves the country selected to prevent an error from the division combobox.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - trigged by clicking the clear button.

    • onAppts

      public void onAppts(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Opens the Appointments View
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - triggered by clicking the appointments button.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onReports

      public void onReports(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Opens the Reports View
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - triggered by clicking the reports button
      Throws:
      IOException

    • populateCountries

      private void populateCountries()
      Pulls countries from the database to load into the combobox.

      mouseEvent - triggered by selecting a customer.
